Contract description in french
        
           (Unformatted version to allow greater ease of reading    
Single-use bioreactors have become more prevalent in the research and development of biopharmaceutical technologies. In these contexts, they can be used together with other sorts of bioreactors. A bioreactor with  a 50L working volume may include power supply, stainless steel, and proprietary equipment (eg Water Bath/Card Baffles).
